Ride.title: Ride
Ride.description: Represents a ride request and its lifecycle within the VamO app.

passengerId.description: The unique identifier of the passenger who requested the ride.

origin.description: The origin coordinates of the ride.

destination.description: The destination details of the ride.

estimatedDurationSeconds.description: Estimated travel time in seconds from origin to destination.

discountAmount.description: The amount discounted from the ride, covered by the app.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the ride was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the ride was last updated.

finishedAt.description: Timestamp of when the ride was finished.

driverId.description: The unique identifier of the driver assigned to the ride.

driverArrivalInfo.description: Estimated distance and duration for the driver to arrive at the origin.

pauseStartedAt.description: Timestamp of when the current pause started.

pauseHistory.description: A history of pause events during the ride.

passengerRating.description: Rating given by the driver to the passenger (e.g., 1-5).

driverRating.description: Rating given by the passenger to the driver (e.g., 1-5).

passengerComments.description: Comments from the driver about the passenger.

driverComments.description: Comments from the passenger about the driver.

vamoPointsAwarded.description: Vamo points awarded to the passenger for this ride.

audited.description: Indicates if a ride has been reviewed by an admin.

auditComment.description: A comment left by the AI fraud detection system or an admin.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores public profile information for a user (passenger, driver, or admin).

email.description: User's email for login and communication.

role.description: The role of the user within the system.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the profile was last updated.

profileCompleted.description: Flag to indicate if user has completed their profile information.

activeBonus.description: Whether the user has an active 10% discount bonus.

approved.description: (For Drivers) Indicates if the driver is approved by an admin.

driverStatus.description: The current status of the driver.

carModelYear.description: The model year of the driver's car.

vehicleVerificationStatus.description: The verification status of the driver's vehicle.

currentLocation.description: The driver's current real-time location. Only applicable for drivers.

DriverSummary.title: Driver Summary
DriverSummary.description: Stores weekly financial summary for a driver.

driverId.description: The unique identifier of the driver.

totalEarnings.description: Total gross earnings for the week.

commissionOwed.description: The commission owed to the app, calculated based on the variable rate.

commissionRate.description: The commission rate applied for this week (e.g., 0.08 for 8%).

bonusesApplied.description: Total amount of passenger discounts covered by the app.

status.description: The payment status of the commission.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the summary was last updated.

AuditLog.title: Audit Log
AuditLog.description: Records actions performed by administrators for auditing purposes.

adminId.description: The UID of the admin who performed the action.

adminName.description: The name of the admin for easy reference.

entityId.description: The ID of the document that was affected (e.g., a user ID or ride ID).

details.description: Optional extra details about the action.

definition.description: Represents a ride request and its lifecycle.
Stores public profile information for a user.
Stores a driver's weekly financial summary.
Stores a log of administrative actions for auditing.
